Rituals.name: Blood Walk
Rituals.description: An advanced version of A Taste for Blood, the caster is able to learn even more information about another Kindred from their vitae.

Rituals.name: Bloody Message
Rituals.description: This ritual allows the vampire to write a message in blood, unto a UV bathed mirror. That message then appears for a recipient on another reflective surface, recalled by the vampire, which then clears upon being read.

Rituals.name: Beelzebeatit
Rituals.description: This ritual causes lower-order living creatures to find the ritual area repellent.

Rituals.name: Clinging of the Insect
Rituals.description: Gives the caster the ability to cling to walls like a spider.

Rituals.name: Coax the Garden
Rituals.description: Allows the caster to manipulate plant life, to their defense.

Rituals.name: Craft Bloodstone
Rituals.description: Creates a Bloodstone, a magical tracking device.

Rituals.name: Douse the Fear
Rituals.description: This Ritual allows the caster to briefly douse their natural vampiric fear of fire.

Rituals.name: Seal the Brand
Rituals.description: Allows the user to mark their own flesh with things like tattoos permanently.

Rituals.name: Enrich the Blood
Rituals.description: This ritual increases the potency of human blood, allowing Kindred to slake their Hunger from a smaller quantity of blood.

Rituals.name: Herd Ward
Rituals.description: This rituals allows the vampire to protect their herd, from poachers.

Rituals.name: Letter Ward
Rituals.description: This ritual is used by Tremere, when they want to make sure the missives they send are protected.

Rituals.name: Unseen Underground
Rituals.description: Turns the caster invisible for a time, when they are underground.

Rituals.name: Wake with Evening's Freshness
Rituals.description: Allows the caster to freshly awaken from torpor during the day as if it were already evening.

Rituals.name: Ward Against Ghouls
Rituals.description: This rituals allows the user to ward off ghouls.

Rituals.name: As Fog on Water
Rituals.description: Allows the Vampire to walk on water silently.

Rituals.name: Calix Secretus
Rituals.description: Allows the Vampire to turn a mundane object into a receptacle for their own blood, storing it for use later.

Rituals.name: Calling the Aura's Remnant
Rituals.description: Allowing the vampire to speak with a corpse's aura (not their ghost)

Rituals.name: Communicate with Kindred Sire
Rituals.description: Creates a telepathic link between a childe and their sire.

Rituals.name: Enhance Dyscrasia
Rituals.description: This ritual allows many vampires to feed from a mortal with a Dyscrasia, without killing the vessel.

Rituals.name: Eyes of Babel
Rituals.description: The caster gains the ability to read and speak any language known by their target.

Rituals.name: Illuminate the Trail of Prey
Rituals.description: Allows the caster to perceive the past whereabouts of an individual through a glowing trail.

Rituals.name: Soporific Touch
Rituals.description: The caster turns a dose of their own vitae into a narcotic, 'truth-serum' like substance that leaves a victim more suggestible and vulnerable to mind-affecting Disciplines like Presence and Dominate.

Rituals.name: Truth of Blood
Rituals.description: Creates a potion capable of discerning lies from truth in a statement.

Rituals.name: The Shroud of Silence
Rituals.description: Used by the Banu Haqim, this ritual creates a shroud of impenetrable silence centered in a room.

Rituals.name: Ward against Spirits
Rituals.description: Wards a meter sized area against spirits.

Rituals.name: Warding Circle against Ghouls
Rituals.description: Creates a warded circle that prevents ghouls from crossing.

Rituals.name: Bladed Hands
Rituals.description: Physically sharpens the caster's hands.

Rituals.name: Bloodless Feast
Rituals.description: This ritual creates an elixir that holds a human sacrifice's Resonance or Dyscrasia (if any), but also makes any vampire who drinks it, more vulnerable to diablerie.

Rituals.name: Communal Vigor
Rituals.description: Based on sanguinary properties similar to the Vaulderie, this Ritual allows a Pack Priest to share their Blood Potency with their pack, while strengthening their own ability to keep those packmates in line.

Rituals.name: Dagon's Call
Rituals.description: Based on sanguinary properties similar to the Vaulderie, this Ritual allows a Pack Priest to share their Blood Potency with their pack, while strengthening their own ability to keep those packmates in line.

Rituals.name: Deflection of Wooden Doom
Rituals.description: Causes a stake about to pierce the heart to shatter.

Rituals.name: Essence of Air
Rituals.description: Creates a potion that grants the user limited flight abilities.

Rituals.name: Eyes of the Past
Rituals.description: Recalls events in the caster's mind about past events that took place in their location up to five years prior.

Rituals.name: Fire in the Blood
Rituals.description: Causes a painful, burn like pain in the blood of a victim.

Rituals.name: Firewalker
Rituals.description: The caster increases the target's resistance to fire.

Rituals.name: Galvanic Ruination
Rituals.description: This Ritual violently disrupts electrical currents in the area, shorting out or fusing all wiring in the vicinity.

Rituals.name: Gentle Mind
Rituals.description: Increases the frenzy resistance of the target's mind.

Rituals.name: Haunted House
Rituals.description: Causes a vampire haven to appear haunted.

Rituals.name: Herd Ward
Rituals.description: This rituals allows the vampire to protect their herd, from poachers.

Rituals.name: Illusion of Peaceful Death
Rituals.description: Restores wounds on a corpse (at most half-unexsanguinated) to conceal evidence of an unnatural death.

Rituals.name: One with the Blade
Rituals.description: The caster enchants a dedicated weapon with immunity to rust and dulling almost as if it were a ghoul, as long as it remains within their possession. If stolen, it ages and becomes able to perform Aggravated damage on its original enchanter.

Rituals.name: Sanguine Watcher
Rituals.description: Summons a rat familiar out of Kindred vitae.

Rituals.name: Sleep of Judas
Rituals.description: Creates a drug that can incapacitate a kindred.

Rituals.name: The Unseen Change
Rituals.description: Forces a Garou into their Lupus form.

Rituals.name: Ward against Lupine
Rituals.description: Wards a meter sized area against the lupine.

Rituals.name: Warding Circle against Spirits
Rituals.description: Creates a warded circle that prevents spirits from crossing.

Rituals.name: Defense of the Sacred Haven
Rituals.description: Wards a haven against the sun itself.

Rituals.name: Eyes of the Nighthawk
Rituals.description: Allows the caster to possess a carnivorous bird.

Rituals.name: Feast of Ashes
Rituals.description: Make another vampire unable to drink blood for a night.

Rituals.name: Guided Memory
Rituals.description: By drinking the blood of a willing Kindred one can relive the memories of the donor.

Rituals.name: Incorporeal Passage
Rituals.description: Allows the caster to pass freely through solid objects and become immune to physical damage.

Rituals.name: Innocence of the Child's Heart
Rituals.description: Conceals the caster's Kindred aura from Auspex.

Rituals.name: Invisible Chains of Binding
Rituals.description: Binds the victim in invisible chains, binding them to the spot for the duration of the ritual.

Rituals.name: Protean Curse
Rituals.description: Transforms the target into a bat.

Rituals.name: Rending the Sweet Earth
Rituals.description: Reveals the presence of a Protean Earth Meld user.

Rituals.name: Ward against Kindred
Rituals.description: Wards a meter sized area against the Kindred.

Rituals.name: Warding Circle against Lupines
Rituals.description: Creates a warded circle that prevents Lupines from crossing.

Rituals.name: Web of Hunger
Rituals.description: Web of Hunger is an extension of the Extinguish Vitae power. Instead of controlling a single person's vitae slowly and corrosively draining vitae from multiple targets.

Rituals.name: Antebrachia Ignium
Rituals.description: Allows the caster to coat their arms in vitae and light them on fire, being magically protected from the flames.

Rituals.name: Dominion
Rituals.description: Allows the Vampire to prevent the use of disciplines by anyone but themselves.

Rituals.name: Eden's Bounty
Rituals.description: Allows to caster to drain blood from creatures within a nearby area.

Rituals.name: Escape to True Sanctuary
Rituals.description: The caster creates two circles that act as a one-way portal from one point to another.

Rituals.name: Heart of Stone
Rituals.description: Turns the caster's heart into stone, making them immune to stakes but completely numbs their sense of emotional and social awareness.

Rituals.name: Shaft of Belated Dissolution
Rituals.description: Enchants a stake with enough power to kill a vampire upon contact with their heart.

Rituals.name: Simulacrum Gate
Rituals.description: A time-consuming and elaborate Ritual, this colossal undertaking allows the construction of a distance-defying portal allowing multiple vampires to cross vast distances in mere moments.

Rituals.name: The Ritual of Transferring the Soul
Rituals.description: The Ritual of Transferring the Soul is a 5th level combined Blood Sorcery ritual and Oblivion Ceremony that usually requires two Kindred participants: one who knows the requisite level of Blood Sorcery, and another who is versed in Oblivion. It is possible for a single Kindred who possesses both Disciplines to perform the ritual alone.

Rituals.name: Warding Circle against Kindred
Rituals.description: Creates a warded circle that prevents Kindred from crossing.
